|brand = AL Tech |model = XM-242U |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = October 3, 2011 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/AL_Tech_AnyGate_11N_W-LAN_Adapter_(XM-242U) |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 14b2 |device_id = 3c07 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Ralink;; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = <!-- Number of transmit radio chains --> |rxchains = <!-- Number of receive radio chains --> |sstreams = <!-- Number of spatial data streams --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = <!-- 150, 300, 450, Maximum throughput rated at --> |802.11g = <!-- 54, 108, Maximum throughput rated at --> |802.11b = <!-- 11, Maximum throughput rated at --> |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
